Text: 多Which is the password for the file?
Um... no password... it's an mp4 video.

real, but it being mp4 means the quality is only decent despite it being 720p.

Also, it cuts out at the end for no apparent reason near the end of a song after the unnecessarily long encore chant... seriously, its huge...
I'm pretty sure the attacker are Korean.
Why does it cut out at the end? Seriously, the Melt encore is enormous.

Sorry folks, I thought I checked to make sure the file was intact... Imma look through the originals the user gave me to see if the encore is intact.

@Doremonhg, Koreans were never responsible. Without revealing too much and scaring this wanker off, info has come in that the faker was Japanese. Also, my bad - "sega" looks fake for all the world, but it turns out it really is the director of the concerts asserting his IP. (It's still annoying, and that's what G-d made piracy for.) (:

Nico Nico Douga has support for overseas accounts now, so I will be grabbing videos directly from there whenever possible. Still not great quality, but at least it's something.

Thanks all for feedback!
